get.description: Returns the list of supported REST operations.
Gets the list of action plans
Gets the specified action plan operation
Returns an array of file containers.
Retrieves the specific file container details.

post.description: Invokes bootstrap action on the product deployment
Invokes deploy action on the product
Invokes remove action on the product deployment
Invokes rotate secrets action on the product deployment

get.description: Returns an array of product packages.
Retrieves the specific product package details.
Returns an array of product secrets.
Retrieves the specific product secret details.

Resource.description: Object model of azure resource manager base.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object. This name should match the name that appears in RBAC or the event service.

display.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation or action.

Display.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation or action.

provider.description: The localized, friendly version of the resource provider name. The provider name is expected to include the name of the publisher or company responsible. The provider name format should use title case and begin with "Microsoft" for first-party services. For example, the provider name may be"Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute."

resource.description: The localized, friendly version of the resource type related to this action or operation; the resource type should match the public documentation for the resource provider.

operation.description: The localized, friendly name for the operation. Use the name as it will displayed to the user.

description.description: The localized, friendly description for the operation. The description will be displayed to the user. It should be thorough and concise for used in both tooltips and detailed views.

nextLink.description: URI to the next page of operations.

blobContainerName.description: Blob container name storing the deployment data

parameters.description: The deployment parameters in JToken format

isTerminal.description: a value indicating whether this instance is terminal

blobContainerName.description: Blob container name storing the deployment data

parameters.description: The deployment parameters in JToken format

outputs.description: The action plan operation outputs in JToken format

fileContainerId.description: File container resource identifier containing product manifest.

sourceUri.description: The remote file location. This is write-only property, DRP never returns it back to a user.

postCopyAction.description: Specifies the file post copy action.

uri.description: The file or container Uri. This is read-only property; a user cannot set it.

PostCopyAction.description: Specifies the file post copy action.

FileContainerId.description: File container resource identifier containing product manifest.

FileContainerParameters.description: Parameters for creating a new file container.

postCopyAction.description: Specifies the file post copy action.

duration.description: Duration in TimeSpan format(Define which ISO format)

versionString.description: Version string in the format of integers seperated with dots

fileContainerId.description: File container resource identifier containing product manifest.

isDeployable.description: Value indicating whether the package is applicable for deployment.

isUpdatable.description: Value indicating whether the package is applicable for update.

productDeploymentId.description: The identifier of product deployment; null if this version is not installed.

expiresAfter.description: The expiration period of the secret.

SecretValue.description: The secret value in a secure string format.

PfxPassword.description: The pfx certificate file password as a secure string.

SymmetricKey.description: The symmetric key as a secure string.

Password.description: The password as a secure string.

SecretParameters.description: Parameters required for creating/updating a product secret.

secretValue.description: The secret value in a secure string format.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

OperationIdParameter.description: Identifier of the action plan operation.
OperationIdParameter.name: operationId

FileContainerParameters.description: The parameters required to create a new file container.
FileContainerParameters.name: fileContainerParameters

ResourceGroupParameter.description: The resource group the resource is located under.
ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroup

SecretParameters.description: The parameters required for creating/updating a product secret.
SecretParameters.name: secretParameters

SecretValueParameter.description: The secret value in a secure string format.
SecretValueParameter.name: secretValue

azure_auth.description: Authorization uses an Azure Active Directory OAuth2 flow.
